data.description: Direct perl connection to a mod_bt tracker.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Apache::ModBT is a stub module for Net::BitTorrent::LibBTT. When
    libbtt is running from within the apache2 mod_bt module, the
    Apache::ModBT module will provide you with a tracker object that
    refers directly to the running mod_bt tracker instance instead of
    creating a new database connection.
